General.Name: Cristales
General.Description: Cristalerías de Chile S.A. manufactures and sells glass containers for wine, beer, non-alcoholic beverages, liquors, and food markets in Chile and internationally. The company operates through Glass Containers, Wine, Communications, Electric Generation, and Investment segments. It is also involved in the production, import, export, and sale of alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, such as wines and spirits; generation of electricity; and written, digital, and editorial press activities. The company was founded in 1904 and is based in Padre Hurtado, Chile. Cristalerías de Chile S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Compañía Electro Metalúrgica S.A.
General.Address: JosE Luis Caro N 501, Padre Hurtado, Chile
